alert.note: Alert for Covington; Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 27 at 4:50AM CDT until September 28 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR STONE & GEORGE COUNTIES IN MISSISSIPPI, MOBILE, BALDWIN, ESCAMBIA, AND CONECUH COUNTIES IN ALABAMA, AND ALL OF THE WESTERN FLORIDA PANHANDLE DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS AROUND 15 MPH, AND HIGH KBDI/ERC VALUES... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM CDT WEDNESDAY FOR THE ENTIRE REGION DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS AROUND 15 MPH, AND HIGH KBDI/ERC VALUES... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS AROUND 15 MPH, AND HIGH KBDI/ERC VALUES... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM CDT WEDNESDAY DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS BETWEEN 15 TO 25 MPH, AND HIGH KBDI/ERC VALUES... The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 11 AM this morning to 7 PM CDT this evening. A Red Flag Warning has also been issued from 11 AM to 7 PM CDT Wednesday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 059 and 060. * WINDS...North to northeast winds around 15 mph today with higher gusts. On Wednesday north to northeast winds increase to 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Between 15 to 20 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
